name: Family Uz Restobar
address: 1915 Coney Island Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11230, USA

reviews.text: Family restobar is one of the best restaurants ever you should go try it I recommend lamp chops it is a very nice meal .

I‚Äôm really disappointed with this order. Who would ever pack a hot dish together with cold sushi? The borscht completely spilled, and the sushi that was placed underneath became warm and spoiled. The whole order arrived in terrible condition ‚Äî it honestly looked like something taken from the trash.

This was an unacceptable experience. I truly hope the restaurant pays more attention to proper packaging and food quality in the future.
The experience is amazing and the food is great we had a great time , not to loud and perfect place for you and your family/friends
Big thank you to Ruhtan and the restaurant for the best service! Gonna order delivery from this place again and again. 5 star for all‚ù§Ô∏èüî•‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

I have to say, I wish I could give this restaurant zero stars. I celebrated my birthday here today, and it was a disappointing experience that guarantees I won‚Äôt be back. The staff lacked basic customer service skills; they were not only‚Ä¶

Great experience My Mom love it !! Service was exquisite, from the food, ambience,, the price was well within reason. I tried Manti,Shurpa and special Samsa and that tasted like candy and melted in my mouth! The  portion was magnificent and the side dishes you will not regret it! Especially thanks for the chefs !
The food was brought to us after about 5 mins. The people are really nice and ready to assist you anytime you want. Finally, the atmosphere is really nice.
All was great there
Yummy üòã

Ordered through Uber Eats and everything was delicious! The baked shrimp roll was flavorful and perfectly cooked, the fried lagman was crispy yet tender, and the Tashkent salad was fresh and balanced. Great quality and packaging‚Äîwill definitely order again!

Very good family restaurant
Very good salads shashliki
Amazing staff, very kind and attentive. Beautiful place and delicious food! Will be coming again soon

The meat is 50/50 either overcooked or either uncooked which is almost 70% of the time service terrible and the atmosphere is really cold and Smokey place never returning agian the manager is always angry for some reason terrible place over all
Love this place for fresh and delicious halal foods, neat, clean and very beautiful place. Professional and polite staff. Definitely recommend
Food was ok. Staff was so rude i could not believe it. The manager/owner walking around in a suit was so rude, i will never return. He has no clue how to treat his customers...he gets 0/5 from me.

I went to this restaurant with my wife to try some good Uzi food, but the quality of the food was terrible. I have never experienced such rudeness in my life from the owner/manager, who was wearing a suit. I will never be coming back.
We visited the Restaurant with family members and they had a great service with foods they provided us
Outstanding food, The atmosphere is exquisite. Very esthetic and modern look in the restaurant. 10/10. Amazing service in general. Only issue I had was finding parking.

Beautiful place for parties , tasty and beautiful presentation of food , live music, fast and great service.
I recommend, you will not be disappointed.
Can‚Äôt even explain the taste best place and workers I had to come back for more things love it
Ordered jiz biz. Very delicious with soft meat. Highly recommend this place. I like Dizayn interior. STAF is professional. Thank you Family UZ

‚ÄúA wonderful place for a family outing! We came with our family and had a great time: top-notch service, with friendly and attentive staff. The restaurant is beautifully decorated, and the atmosphere is cozy and musical, adding a special touch. The Tajik and Uzbek cuisine dishes were absolutely delicious ‚Äì a real find for lovers of traditional cuisine. We left wanting to come back, and this place has definitely become my favorite. A huge thanks to the staff for their hospitality and excellent service!‚Äù
Beautiful restaurant, great cuisine, polite staff, I recommend visiting.
